footer_text: Â© 2025 Trace4Ag. Ensuring food transparency through blockchain technology.
hero_subtitle: Complete supply chain visibility through blockchain technology, AI-powered quality assessment, and real-time tracking. Ensure food safety and authenticity at every step.
features_subtitle: Advanced technology meets agricultural transparency for a safer food supply chain.
feature_1_desc: Immutable records ensure complete transparency from farm to fork.
feature_2_desc: Instant verification with any smartphone camera.
feature_3_desc: Live monitoring and anomaly detection across the supply chain.
feature_4_desc: GPS tracking prevents tampering and ensures authenticity.
portals_subtitle: Access role-specific dashboards tailored for each participant in the supply chain.
portal_farmer_desc: Register crops and generate QR codes
portal_aggregator_desc: Track and log supply chain events
portal_admin_desc: Monitor and audit the entire ecosystem
